mapper.sql: USER_ID, ROLE_ID, STATE, CREATE_PERSION, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_PERSON, UPDATE_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_USER_ROLE (USER_ID, ROLE_ID, STATE, CREATE_PERSION, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_PERSON, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{roleId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createPersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE})

insert into SYS_USER_ROLE (USER_ID, ROLE_ID)
select #{item.userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.roleId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} from dual

insert into SYS_USER_ROLE
USER_ID,
ROLE_ID,
STATE,
CREATE_PERSION,
CREATE_TIME,
UPDATE_PERSON,
UPDATE_TIME,
#{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{roleId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{createPersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},

mapper.update:
update SYS_USER_ROLE
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_PERSION = #{createPersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
UPDATE_PERSON = #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE},
where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
